description: Aikawa Ayumu is a normal high school boy. One day he is killed by a serial killer and revived as a zombie by a necromancer named Eucliwood Hellscythe. He starts to serve Eu as her guard but he happens to deprive the mahou shoujo Haruna of her magic power. Haruna orders Ayumu to fight against the anti-mahou shoujo system "Megalo" in her place.

title.romaji: Kore wa Zombie desu ka? OVA
title.native: これはゾンビですか? OVA

title.romaji: Kawaikereba Hentai demo Suki ni Natte Kuremasu ka?
title.english: Hensuki: Are you willing to fall in love with a pervert, as long as she’s a cutie?

title.romaji: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead: Hai, Minotake ni Attemasu
title.english: Is This a Zombie? Of the Dead: Yes, This Suits Me Just Fine

title.romaji: Ore no Nounai Sentakushi ga, Gakuen Love Comedy wo Zenryoku de Jama Shiteiru
title.english: My Mental Choices Are Completely Interfering With My School Romantic Comedy

title.romaji: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
title.english: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!
